Milpitas.Silicon Valley University:
== History ==
Silicon Valley University (SVU) is a private, higher educational institution located in San Jose, California, US. The university was accredited by the Accrediting Council for Independent Colleges and Schools (ACICS) at the bachelor's degree, and master's degree level until the accreditor lost its legitimacy in December 2016.
Silicon Valley University used to be located at 2160 Lundy Avenue, San Jose CA 95131. In 2014, SVU bought a new building and moved to the new address at 2010 Fortune Drive, San Jose CA 95131.
